import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { adminSession:string; userSession:string; ngOnInit(): void { this.adminSession=sessionStorage.getItem("adminSession"); this.userSession=sessionStorage.getItem("userSession"); } }

Delicious Meal

Don't starve, just order

Good food is the foundation of genuine happiness.

Sign in
About Us

Welcome to Food Munch

At Food Munch, When we say good, we don’t just mean good food. We also mean the goodness that good food leads to. Good memories, a good temper, a good day, a good burp. And we know that when our food leaves our kitchens, we’re creating all that. It’s rewarding, this belief in good. Now take a look at how we go about it.

With a team of skilled chefs and a commitment to quality, we strive to deliver a dining experience that goes beyond expectations. From our carefully curated ingredients to the artistic presentation of our dishes, we aim to awaken your senses and elevate your dining moments.
